message.body: Hi again!
Yo!
We're gonna try for the Mexican for dinner & Harold may try to join us -working on that now
Mmm. Have fun. I like Mex. food, but I have to go easy on the heat.
Yeah, we aren't particularly spice heads like Josh & Lisa. We go for flavor rather than heat
n a recipe instead of the mild one; we had both. She & Sus were very happy with it, but Jeremy glugged down his drink and I ran for the sink to rinse my
mouth!
Yuh. Rene liked hot spice, and Susannah just loves it. So did our foster son Andrew. Rene once accidentally used the hot version of something (salsa?) i
Ah
Marc said thank you for the birthday wishes
:-) How was dinner?
Was good - we ended up doing Indian
MMMMMMmmmmm!
Mexican place was having its Grand Opening - complete with mariachi band
Yah, that would make conversation difficult
I don't like places that blast my ears
(I'm having my face rubbed now by somebody very furry)
Nope - we don't either
We like to hear each other talk
What did u eat?
Aw - sketch Ista for me
I had seafood korma, Harold had a mixed tandoori grill, Sue had tandoori shrimp, & Glasser had tandoori salmon
They all had coconut soup; I had mushroom soup
We had a channa poori for the table, along with a peshwari naan and a plain paratha
Aaugh! This fool gadget keeps crashing.
Marc & I had rasmalai for dessert; Harold had gulabjamon; & Sue had rice pudding
Sorry to hear that
Goodie! - Was that "sketch" or "skritch"?
Skritch
Stupid auto correct
Bah. She's licking the butter dish again. That's why I keep the lid on with a rubber band.
LOL
She's not supposed to be on the table. Which meansâ€¦ nothing, to her.
Yeah, I understand that
the vet put her on a strict novel protein diet, no exceptions.
I had to stop giving her bits of people food, like licking the leftover milk out of my cereal bowl. She had some bad digestive upsets around 6mos ago, &
Ah
Ours don't have any interest in people food, thank heavens
They do get put out if I don't get up in the morning & give them each a handful of kitty treats
Would you believe: green peas & duck?!
e the main ingredients.
That's the novel protein diet. "Novel"= she wasn't having them before, so this is free of any suspected allergens. This is a kibble... That is, those ar
Yum!
"Meow! It's my meowsical meowser!" "(I wish he wouldn't try to speak my language. He just sounds silly.)"
Cool
Vet wrote me a Rx but it turns out I can get a non-Rx brand in the pet store right at the end of the block.
Even better!
(I keep getting ... Not auto-miscorrections but misrecognitions: Swypos. ) But I usu. - not always - catch them before sending.
And much cheaper
I'm going to head out soon: I have a lot to do today. I think we have all weekend for this one.
Cool! I have 5 articles to write today
Wow. Write well!
Ttyl
Thx! Have a great day!
U2 bye
Bye
